content.question: In which of the following ways could the president try to limit the impact of a Supreme Court decision?

choices.label: Calling for the removal of the Supreme Court justices
Instructing the Department of Justice to delay the implementation of a provision of the decision
Passing legislation that overrides the Court's opinion
Changing the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court

content.answer: Instructing the Department of Justice to delay the implementation of a provision of the decision

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
